product_name: NEMO Rhythm 40 Sleeping Bag - Long - 2014 Closeout
long_description: The long-length, spoon-shaped Rhythm 40 Sleeping Bag offers generous room found in camping sleeping bags with the performance of a backpacking sleeping bag to keep you comfortable on 3-season trips.
short_description: The long-length, spoon-shaped Rhythm 40 Sleeping Bag offers generous room found in camping sleeping bags with the performance of a backpacking sleeping bag to keep you comfortable on 3-season trips.
